title: Top 30 International Adventure Travel Companies

Top 30 Adventure Travel Companies My picks for top adventure travel companies in the world Sign Up for our Free Newsletters Thanks, You're in! Health Tip of the Day Sign up There was an error. Please try again. Please select a newsletter. Please enter a valid email address. Did you mean ? 11. REI Adventures Offers Great Active Travel Trips 
REI Adventures offers great active travel trips, such as canoeing on a lake here in the U.S., cycling in Vietnam, or sea kayaking and hiking in Croatia. And, these are just a few of the 90plus weekend-to-multiweek trips offered by REI Adventures, part of the REI that has more than 80 stores in the U.S. chock-full of equipment and clothing for adventure travelers. More » River Rafting with Row Adventures. Row Adventures 12. River Rafting & Other Adventure Vacations with ROW Adventures 
ROW Adventures offers river-rafting trips and adventurous vacations as diverse as snorkeling with sea lions and turtles in the Galapagos Islands and camel trekking in Algeria. Some of ROW's trips have been included in National Geographic Traveler Magazine’s “Tours of a Lifetime” for three years running, and Outside Magazine’s Top Ten New Trips for two consecutive years. More » 13. Adventure Travel Trips and Vacations With Travcoa Travcoa is one of the leading providers of luxury escorted tours, luxury custom vacations and private jet trips. Some of the destinations include Antarctica, Africa, Asia, Europe, South America, India and China, and such exotic locales as Bhutan, Easter Island, Lapland, and Madagascar. The escorted tours are limited to 18 persons and the average is 12. More » Carry bikes across the river on a BikeHike Adventures trip. BikeHike Adventures 15. Road Scholar - Created by Elderhostel - Attracts Younger Travelers 
Road Scholar - with its tagline "Adventures in Lifelong Learning" - is a reinvented version of Elderhostel. The for-profit Elderhostel created Road Scholar to encourage younger travelers to experience educational adventures. 
The trips still incorporate the insightful additions to trips that have attracted senior travelers since 1975. But, don't assume these are all tame trips where you look out a bus window. Trips range from study cruises in the Galapagos Islands to hiking in Patagonia. 
One of Road Scholar's newest trips include the chance to meet with locals, artists and intellectuals while exploring Cuba. More » 16. Butterfield & Robinson 
This Canadian company has focused on luxury-oriented biking and walking trips since 1966. B&R is a leader in designing vacations in countries and providing experiences that are on the cutting edge of trendy. Check out the hiking and biking trips in Vietnam and Peru Walking or Galapagos Island by Sea. B&R arranges special treats such as private musical performances and learning to cook regional specialties from local chefs. B&R also plans outstanding "Bespoke" (custom) vacations. More » 17. Abercrombie & Kent Luxury trips are Abercrombie & Kent's hallmark. The new Explorer Series focuses on remote locations such as Papua New Guinea and Mongolia. True to A&K's style, even while on the Footsteps of the Khan trip travelers stay in gers (tents) with ensuite bathrooms, and a mobile kitchen and chef come along for the overland journey. More » Trekking and camping in China's Taklimakan Desert with Wandrian Adventures. Wandrian Adventures Wandrian Adventures focuses on combining adventures, education, and culture into one-of-a-kind small group adventure travel packages. The trips are customized and eco-sensitive.
